author: Tom Orry
description:
It's that special time of year when we all come together with friends and family. That's right, it's just two-ish weeks until Christmas. It's also time for another award show/game reveal event in the shape of The Game Awards. We've had teases (the statue, what does it mean?), we expect bad trainers (sneakers, I think they call them in the US), and for it to run about twice as long as anyone really wants. But, and this is a big but, we might also get some big games shown off or announced.

Read more
title: Watch The Game Awards 2025 with us, live - how to watch and when does it start?
